entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:58 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
